title: Blood River Divine Power · Xutian Xuangling

scenes.description: 画面淡入,展现云雾缭绕的仙域上空,金色卷轴在空中展开,光芒闪动,背景音乐渐起。

visual.composition: Misty immortal skies with a golden scroll unfurling
visual.environment: Immortal realm sky filled with swirling clouds and golden light
visual.fx: Golden radiance and unfolding scroll effect

scenes.prompt: Xianxia opening, mist-wreathed immortal sky with a golden scroll unfurling, spiritual particles drifting, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 我是云卷仙音，欢迎回来。第34集:血河神通·旭天玄灵。

scenes.description: 士气一涨之下,妖气霞光毫不迟疑滚滚追去,将后面百余只逃得稍慢的木石傀儡一卷而碎。

visual.composition: Morale rises, demon qi and light clouds roll forward without hesitation, sweep away over a hundred slower wooden and stone puppets
visual.fx: Demon qi, light clouds, puppets breaking

scenes.prompt: Morale rises, demon qi and light clouds roll forward without hesitation, sweep away over a hundred slower wooden and stone puppets.
scenes.narration: 士气一涨之下,妖气霞光滚滚追去,将百余只逃得稍慢的傀儡一卷而碎。

scenes.description: 眨眼间部分人妖就已经冲入了谷口中,竟真的丝毫抵挡没有,灵族不战而退。

visual.composition: In a blink, some humans and demons already charge into valley entrance, truly no resistance at all, spirits retreat without fighting

scenes.prompt: In a blink, some humans and demons already charge into valley entrance, truly no resistance at all, spirits retreat without fighting.
scenes.narration: 眨眼间部分人妖就已冲入谷口,竟真的丝毫抵挡没有,灵族不战而退。

scenes.description: 寰姓少年和黄粱灵君见到此幕不禁露出一丝惊疑,他们当年可都亲自和灵族大战过。

visual.composition: Huan youth and Huangliang Spirit Lord see this, show suspicion, they both personally fought spirits before

scenes.prompt: Huan youth and Huangliang Spirit Lord see this, show suspicion, they both personally fought spirits before.
scenes.narration: 寰姓少年和黄粱灵君见到此幕不禁露出一丝惊疑,他们当年都曾与灵族大战。

scenes.description: 寰姓少年脸色一沉,转首对黄粱灵君飞快说道,不行,让他们快些停下,有些不对劲。

visual.composition: Huan youth's face darkens, turns to Huangliang Spirit Lord quickly says, no, make them stop quickly, something's wrong

scenes.prompt: Huan youth's face darkens, turns to Huangliang Spirit Lord quickly says, no, make them stop quickly, something's wrong.
scenes.narration: 寰姓少年脸色一沉,转首对黄粱灵君说道,不行,让他们快些停下,有些不对劲。

scenes.description: 黄粱灵君点头说,的确有问题,深吸一口气就发出长啸,召回前方之人。

visual.composition: Huangliang Spirit Lord nods says indeed problem, takes deep breath and sends long howl, recalls forward forces

scenes.prompt: Huangliang Spirit Lord nods says indeed problem, takes deep breath and sends long howl, recalls forward forces.
scenes.narration: 黄粱灵君点头说确实有问题,深吸一口气发出长啸,召回前方之人。

scenes.description: 但就在这时,在谷口正上方,一片血光诡异的浮现,接着雷鸣声一起,凝聚成数十丈大的血莲。

visual.composition: But at this moment, above valley entrance, blood light eerily appears, then thunder sounds, condenses into blood lotus dozens of zhang large
visual.fx: Blood light, thunder, blood lotus forming

scenes.prompt: But at this moment, above valley entrance, blood light eerily appears, then thunder sounds, condenses into blood lotus dozens of zhang large.
scenes.narration: 但就在这时,谷口正上方血光诡异浮现,雷鸣声一起,凝聚成数十丈大的血莲。

scenes.description: 莲瓣鲜红似血,血气扑鼻,在半空中滴溜溜的飞快转动着,散发着恐怖威压。

visual.composition: Lotus petals blood red, blood qi pungent, spinning rapidly in midair, emitting terrifying pressure
visual.fx: Blood light, spinning lotus, pressure waves

scenes.prompt: Lotus petals blood red, blood qi pungent, spinning rapidly in midair, emitting terrifying pressure.
scenes.narration: 莲瓣鲜红似血,血气扑鼻,在半空中飞快转动,散发着恐怖威压。

scenes.description: 寰姓少年一见血莲马上失声叫道,不好,是旭天玄灵,黄粱灵君同样大吃一惊。

visual.composition: Huan youth sees blood lotus, immediately exclaims bad, it's Xutian Xuangling, Huangliang Spirit Lord also shocked

scenes.prompt: Huan youth sees blood lotus, immediately exclaims bad, it's Xutian Xuangling, Huangliang Spirit Lord also shocked.
scenes.narration: 寰姓少年一见血莲马上失声叫道,不好,是旭天玄灵,黄粱灵君同样大吃一惊。

scenes.description: 尚未等两人出手相救,血色莲花蓦然化为一道泼天血河,从空中直冲而下。

visual.composition: Before two can act to save, blood lotus suddenly transforms into vast blood river, rushes down from sky

scenes.prompt: Before two can act to save, blood lotus suddenly transforms into vast blood river, rushes down from sky.
scenes.narration: 尚未等两人出手相救,血色莲花蓦然化为泼天血河,从空中直冲而下。

scenes.description: 血水所过之处,无论人妖全都一冲而灭,化为股股青烟消失得无影无踪。

visual.composition: Where blood water passes, all humans and demons swept away, turn into streams of green smoke, vanish completely

scenes.prompt: Where blood water passes, all humans and demons swept away, turn into streams of green smoke, vanish completely.
scenes.narration: 血水所过之处,无论人妖全都一冲而灭,化为股股青烟消失得无影无踪。

scenes.description: 无论护身妖气还是防御法宝,全都不能抵挡此血水分毫,瞬间被吞噬。

visual.composition: Whether protective demon qi or defensive magic treasures, all cannot resist blood water in slightest, instantly devoured

scenes.prompt: Whether protective demon qi or defensive magic treasures, all cannot resist blood water in slightest, instantly devoured.
scenes.narration: 无论护身妖气还是防御法宝,全都不能抵挡此血水分毫,瞬间被吞噬。

scenes.description: 转眼间人妖两族只剩下未冲进谷中的一小半,侥幸未死之人全都面色煞白。

visual.composition: In a blink, human and demon races only small half left that didn't charge into valley, lucky survivors all pale-faced

scenes.prompt: In a blink, human and demon races only small half left that didn't charge into valley, lucky survivors all pale-faced.
scenes.narration: 转眼间人妖两族只剩下未冲进谷中的一小半,侥幸未死之人全都面色煞白。

scenes.description: 侥幸未死之人对血水如见毒蝎,不等黄粱灵君出声招呼,纷纷倒射逃回。

visual.composition: Lucky survivors treat blood water like poisonous scorpion, without waiting for Huangliang Spirit Lord's call, all retreat backward

scenes.prompt: Lucky survivors treat blood water like poisonous scorpion, without waiting for Huangliang Spirit Lord's call, all retreat backward.
scenes.narration: 侥幸未死之人对血水如见毒蝎,不等黄粱灵君招呼,纷纷倒射逃回。

scenes.description: 那条血河吞噬了如此多人妖后,似乎仍不满足,一卷之下冲出了谷口,直奔逃窜人妖追去。

visual.composition: That blood river devours so many humans and demons, seems still not satisfied, rolls out of valley entrance, chases fleeing humans and demons

scenes.prompt: That blood river devours so many humans and demons, seems still not satisfied, rolls out of valley entrance, chases fleeing humans and demons.
scenes.narration: 那条血河吞噬了如此多人妖后,似乎仍不满足,一卷之下冲出谷口追去。

scenes.description: 寰姓少年和黄粱灵君哪还能坐视不理,当即大怒的一同出手,准备阻止血河。

visual.composition: Huan youth and Huangliang Spirit Lord cannot sit idly by, immediately furious, act together to stop blood river

scenes.prompt: Huan youth and Huangliang Spirit Lord cannot sit idly by, immediately furious, act together to stop blood river.
scenes.narration: 寰姓少年和黄粱灵君哪还能坐视不理,当即大怒的一同出手阻止血河。

scenes.description: 少年一张口,一股灰色妖风狂扑而出,一个打滚后化为一条灰色风蛟,直扑血河。

visual.composition: Youth opens mouth, gray demon wind rushes out, rolls into gray wind dragon, rushes at blood river
visual.fx: Gray wind, wind dragon, blood river

scenes.prompt: Youth opens mouth, gray demon wind rushes out, rolls into gray wind dragon, rushes at blood river.
scenes.narration: 少年张口一股灰色妖风狂扑而出,化为灰色风蛟,直扑血河。

scenes.description: 黄粱灵君一声冷哼,袖袍一抖,一面金黄色八卦镜浮现胸前,两手一掐诀。

visual.composition: Huangliang Spirit Lord snorts coldly, sleeves shake, golden Eight Trigrams mirror appears at chest, hands form seals

scenes.prompt: Huangliang Spirit Lord snorts coldly, sleeves shake, golden Eight Trigrams mirror appears at chest, hands form seals.
scenes.narration: 黄粱灵君一声冷哼,袖袍一抖,金黄色八卦镜浮现胸前,两手一掐诀。

scenes.description: 噗嗤一声后,一道粗若碗口的金色光柱从镜中喷射而出,直射血河前端。

visual.composition: Puff sound, thick golden beam like bowl diameter shoots from mirror, hits blood river front

scenes.prompt: Puff sound, thick golden beam like bowl diameter shoots from mirror, hits blood river front.
scenes.narration: 噗嗤一声后,一道粗若碗口的金色光柱从镜中喷射而出,直射血河前端。

scenes.description: 轰隆隆一阵巨响,风龙和光柱迎头击在血河前端,发出惊人爆裂声,总算将血水势头一阻。

visual.composition: Roaring sounds, wind dragon and light beam hit blood river front, emit explosive sounds, finally stop blood water momentum
visual.character_pose: Wind dragon, golden beam, blood river colliding

scenes.prompt: Roaring sounds, wind dragon and light beam hit blood river front, emit explosive sounds, finally stop blood water momentum.
scenes.narration: 轰隆隆巨响,风龙和光柱迎头击在血河前端,总算将血水势头一阻。

scenes.description: 血河倒流而回,蓦然凝聚成一朵血色莲花,人影一闪,一名身穿皂青长袍的灵族男子站立其上。

visual.composition: Blood river flows back, suddenly condenses into blood lotus, figure flashes, spirit man in dark blue robe stands on it

scenes.prompt: Blood river flows back, suddenly condenses into blood lotus, figure flashes, spirit man in dark blue robe stands on it.
scenes.narration: 血河倒流而回,蓦然凝聚成血色莲花,身穿皂青长袍的灵族男子站立其上。

scenes.description: 正是那位器灵族的旭天,双目犀利异常,哈哈大笑着说没想到这等偏远之地也能碰到同阶存在。

visual.composition: It's that Spirit Artifact race's Xutian, eyes extremely sharp, laughs loudly saying didn't expect to meet same level in this remote place

scenes.prompt: It's that Spirit Artifact race's Xutian, eyes extremely sharp, laughs loudly saying didn't expect to meet same level in this remote place.
scenes.narration: 正是器灵族的旭天,双目犀利异常,大笑说没想到偏远之地也能碰到同阶存在。

scenes.description: 一见对方收了法术,寰姓少年和黄粱灵君互望一眼,也将神通暂时一收。

visual.composition: Seeing opponent retracted spells, Huan youth and Huangliang Spirit Lord look at each other, also temporarily retract abilities
visual.character_pose: Two leaders looking at each other, cautious

scenes.prompt: Seeing opponent retracted spells, Huan youth and Huangliang Spirit Lord look at each other, also temporarily retract abilities.
scenes.narration: 一见对方收了法术,寰姓少年和黄粱灵君互望一眼,也将神通暂时一收。

scenes.description: 黄粱灵君目光一扫,一见人族之人只剩下百余人稀疏逃回,不禁大怒喝斥。

visual.composition: Huangliang Spirit Lord glances, sees human side only has sparse hundred-plus people escaping back, furious scolding

scenes.prompt: Huangliang Spirit Lord glances, sees human side only has sparse hundred-plus people escaping back, furious scolding.
scenes.narration: 黄粱灵君目光一扫,见人族只剩下百余人稀疏逃回,不禁大怒喝斥。

scenes.description: 黄粱灵君说旭天身为玄灵竟敢肆无忌惮对晚辈出手,就不怕他们也同样对灵族如此做吗。

visual.composition: Huangliang Spirit Lord says Xutian as Xuangling dares indiscriminately attack juniors, aren't afraid they'll do same to spirits

scenes.prompt: Huangliang Spirit Lord says Xutian as Xuangling dares indiscriminately attack juniors, aren't afraid they'll do same to spirits.
scenes.narration: 黄粱灵君说旭天身为玄灵竟敢肆无忌惮对晚辈出手,不怕他们同样如此做。

scenes.description: 画面淡出,夜色下的仙城剪影,天空洒落灵光,画面逐渐变暗。

visual.composition: Silhouette of the immortal city beneath night, spiritual light raining from the heavens
visual.environment: Night sky, city silhouette, floating light particles

scenes.prompt: Xianxia ending, immortal city silhouette under the night sky, spiritual particles drifting down, calm mysterious atmosphere, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 下一集再见。我是云卷仙音,原著作者忘语。第35集即将开始。
